title: Appeals court weighs 1798 law for Trump deportations of Venezuelans
shortDescription: Federal appeals judges heard arguments about whether the 1798 Alien Enemies Act allows Trump to deport Venezuelan gang members without a military war.

title: Elon Musk vows to defeat Republicans who vote for Trump mega bill
shortDescription: Elon Musk warned that he would boost primary challenges against Republican lawmakers who vote for President Trump's so-called "big, beautiful bill."

title: Faith leaders arrested while protesting GOP mega bill
shortDescription: Religious leaders demanding "moral" budget, arrested while praying outside Capitol, as Senate considers mega-bill

title: Trump's handwritten note to Powell demands Fed lower interest rates
shortDescription: President Trump detailed to Jerome Powell where he thinks interest rates should be set in a handwritten note escalating pressure on the Fed chairman.

title: Go behind the scenes as the Senate votes on Trump flagship bill
shortDescription: The Senate is voting on President Donald Trumpâ€™s sweeping bill on tax cuts, Medicaid and border security, after a marathon weekend of caustic debate and political maneuvering.

title: President Trump pushes Fed to lower interest rates
shortDescription: President Donald Trump sent a note to the Fed chair asking him to lower interest rates.

title: Senate honors slain Idaho firefighters
shortDescription: The U.S. Senate paused during their "vote-a-rama" for the 'Big, Beautiful Bill' to honor Idaho firefighters slain while responding to a fire.

title: GOP Rep. Don Bacon won't seek reelection, an opportunity for Democrats
shortDescription: Nebraska Republican Rep. Don Bacon represents a key battleground district that could help Democrats to regain control of the House.

title: Supreme Court rejects challenge to strip club tax
shortDescription: Georgia passed in 2015 a 1% tax on businesses offering both nude dancing and alcohol. The tax funds services for sexually exploited children.

title: Supreme Court will hear major GOP challenge to campaign spending limit
shortDescription: Republicans urged the Supreme Court to overturn a 2001 decision limiting how much political parties can spend at the direction of candidate.

title: Will Trump visit 'Alligator Alcatraz'?
shortDescription: The FAA issued a "VIP Movement Notification" for July 1 for Ochopee, Florida, near the "Alligator Alcatraz" immigrant detention site.

title: Senate plods along as Republicans negotiate key portions of Trump's bill
shortDescription: The finish line will come after a whirlwind of votes, nicknamed a "vote-a-rama," on what are expected to be dozens of amendments.

title: Israel steps up Gaza bombardment ahead of White House talks on ceasefire
shortDescription: Palestinians reported one of the worst nights of Israeli bombardment in weeks, while Israeli officials were due in Washington for a new ceasefire push.

title: Canada scraps digital services tax to advance stalled US trade talks
shortDescription: Canada scrapped its digital services tax targeting U.S. technology firms late on Sunday in a bid to advance stalled trade negotiations.

title: What is a vote-a-rama? What to know about marathon Senate tradition
shortDescription: The Senate is set to go through a vote-a-rama on amendments to the Trump tax, spending and policy package. Here's what to know about the tradition.
